statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change'
DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE cost > 5000 AND mechanic_name LIKE 'John %';
DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE id = 1 AND vehicle_id = 100;
DELETE FROM vehicle_inspections WHERE vehicle_id = 200 AND inspector_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM ComplianceAndSafety WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND compliance_status = true;
DELETE FROM ComplianceAndSafety WHERE vehicle_id = 1234 AND compliance_type = 'Safety Check';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE date < '2021-01-01' AND cost > 1000;
